articles.author: Patrick Ryan
articles.title: 'Let It Be' at 50: Why the Beatles' last album is a 'mess,' but still spawned a masterpiece - USA TODAY
articles.description: Looking back at the turbulent making of the Beatles' final album "Let It Be," released 50 years ago on May 8, 1970.
articles.content:
Friday 8 May marks the 50th anniversary of the Beatles' final album release, 'Let It Be'. (May 7)
AP Entertainment
You might say "Let It Be" is the ugly duckling of Beatles albums.

articles.description: Queen guitarist Brian May doesn't have coronavirus – but he did need to go to the hospital after he tore his buttocks gardening.
articles.content:
Queen guitarist Brian May had to go to the hospital   but not for coronavirus.
The cause? He tore his buttocks while gardening. Yes, seriously.
